GOOD SHIT
nice one
This game ate my brain.

Co tu dużo mówić. Piękna gra ! Genialna grafika, piękne efekty graficzne, jak i dźwiękowe, niesamowity gameplay na wiele godzin. Gra oferuje tryb fabularny jedno jak i dwuosobowy. Można pobawić się w kreatorze komór społecznościowych. Sama kampania dla osób, które grają po raz pierwszy w tą grę, będzie sprawiała wiele frajdy. Przy grze momentami trzeba pomyśleć, co wpływa bardzo pozytywnie na odbieranie gry samej w sobie. Polecam serdecznie każdemu !!! :D :D :D

Portal was so good but I was able to fly through the game pretty quickly and wished it lasted a little longer. Potral 2 is exactly what did that. The gameplay was amazing and the use of the blue, orange, and white goo was great, it allowed for more levels and to be solved differently than using just portals. Moving to play the multiplayer soon.
Кккккккрутотень!!!!!!
本来是想买了和朋友玩的，然后打开了单人模式，沉迷无法自拔，一转眼就过了十几个小时，除了解密剧情也蛮有趣的。

Ciertamente, el juego es muy adictivo, a mi parecer tiene no solo una jugabilidad muy buena, sino también su historia; {ésta tiene un cambio drástico según muchos nos imaginábamos que sería y causa más revueltas en cuanto al verdadero rol de la historia. Muy recomendable.

Portal 2 é um clássico. História muito boa, gráficos muito bons (considerando que esse jogo é de 2011), puzzles que variam entre dificuldade fácil e média, multiplayer muito bom, muito bem otimizado. Esse jogo é para aqueles que gostam de resolver puzzles, não tão difíceis, com uma história por trás. Não espere momentos de luta ou tiros, mas sim, puzzles que vão fazer você pensar. Gostei muito! Recomendo!
is gud.
Cara iubisof aspetto con ansia il prossimo alf laif dove ripli ucciderà lee e tutto il mondo verrà salvato da delle torrette che parlano in italiano . Grazie sony spero nel prossimo far cri
oynamadan önce sıradan bir oyun gibi gözüken ama oynadıkça seni içine alan esrarengiz bir macera hele final sahnesi ve bitiş müziği... resmen gözümden film şeridi geçti teşekkürler portal 2

神作不解释，剧情尚且不谈，关卡设计的精妙程度让我大开眼界，利用空间的置换使看起来简单粗糙的关卡也显得精致非凡，让人不禁惊呼解谜游戏还能这样玩？当然这游戏最好玩的地方不在于游戏剧情，而是在于社区实验室中玩家自己创造的各个 精巧的自制关卡，在那里你可以体验到由无数玩家们花费诸多精力创造的各种不同的关卡，也可以尽情花挥自己的想像创造独一无二的难题，让新鲜感永不褪色.
这款游戏的最大缺点就是对3D眩晕症的玩家太不友好了，我没有3D眩晕症玩这款游戏尚且玩的头晕眼花，更别谈3D眩晕症患者了.

ОЧЕНЬ!!!! КРУТАЯ ИГРА. 
Мне очень сильно понравилась.
if i didn't constantly try to kill my friends then i would have finished the co-op long ago

Valve'ın En Başarılı Yapımlarından Biri. Fazla Oynamadım Fakat Oyunun Hikaye Modu Olsun, Co-op Modu olsun Ciddi şekilde Kendine Çekiyor.Eğer Bir Arkadaşınızda Portal 2 Varsa Onun İle Oynamayı Unutmayın. İyi Eğlenceler :)

Według mnie to jest najlepsza gra w jaką grałem ogólnie. Każdy krok w tej grze był dla mnie smutny bo wiedziałem że kiedyś w końcu się to skończy. Świetna fabuła dobra optymalizacja i oczywiście świetny gameplay. Ocena odemnie dla tej gierki to nie kwestionowane 11/10
Na nowo się zakochałem <3
I to tak na serio ;)

Portal 2 je hra ve které je za úkol dostat se z bodu A do bodu B pomocí portálů.
Aspoň tak je tomu ze začátku, potom se dostanete do pokročilejší fáze hry kde budete využívat speciální gely, které mají určitě vlastnosti. Gely vám třeba dají větší skok nebo rychlost což je nezbytně důležité pro dokončení levlu. Mnoho věcí si musíte i správně načasovat jinak je budete opakovat neustále dokolečka než si uvědomíte v čem děláte chybu a pak stejně zjistíte že chyba byla jen to načasování.
Je důležité mít zapojené logické myšlení po celou dobu hry jinak to bude velmi obtížné dohrát.

Kooperativní režim je ale zábavnější protože tam můžete s kamarádem dělat hlouposti. Sice jsou nějaké mise obtížnější, ale to vůbec nevadí od toho jsou tam 2 hráči. 

Mě osobně víc bavila kooperace. 
Díky za přečtení
A very classic game that you can enjoy anytime. It is even more fun playing with a friend

Oyun hem oynanış hem hikayesi bakımından çok güzel. Oynanış süresi uzun olduğu için sonlarına doğru biraz sıkabilir ama mükemmel bir final yapıyor.

This game may be six years old but I don't care god dammit. If you haven't played this game yet, you need to get it right now so you can hear this amazing ost and admire the amazing graphics that they had considering the game is six years old!

You play as a human called Chell who wakes up in a room and then soon after a robot tells her that she is in a massive underground facility. The robot then helps her multiple times throughout the story to try and help her escape while trying to avoid being killed me GLaDOS, a massive robot who controls the entire facility.

It's an old game but you gotta GET IT!

(Also you can make your own level's and play other people's levels and there are some really good ones. Also, play this game with your friends, there is an entire singleplayer campaign and co-op campaign as well as single player and co-op custom levels made by other people (as I just said)) Enjoy :P
Recomendo ,bom jogo de puzzle!!

Oyun tek kelimeyle mükemmel. Grafik ve seslerin pek dert edileceği tarzda bir yapıya sahip değil. Eğer bunlara takıntınız varsa o yönden de sıkıntısı yok endişe etmeyin. Gerek oynanış gerek zorluk gerek düşündürücü bir yapısı olması oyunu tadından yenmez hale getiriyor. Kesinlikle denemelisiniz.

Portal 2 offers an incredible physics based gameplay system that stays fun and engaging while allowing you to solve problems creatively all the way through.

The story, dialog and characters come together with the gameplay to create an immersive, unique experience that's impossible to put down until you finish it.

Extremely highly recommended, every single second of this game is pure joy.

Gerek hikayesi gerek mekanikleriyle gayet güzel,bir de arkadaşınız varsa CO-OP modunda güzel vakit geçirilebilecek bir oyun indirimlerde 3 lira gibi bir fiyata düşüyor bu fiyatı kat ve kat hakediceğinden emin olabilirsiniz.

[h1]강추. 무조건 사라.[/h1]

포탈 시리즈는 퍼즐 게임계의 전설이다.

우선 포탈을 통해 퍼즐을 깬다는 것은 
참신하고 놀랍고 굉장히 재밌다.

단지 스테이지를 깨나가는 것만이 아니다.
완벽한 스토리는 게임을 더 즐겁게 한다.

허나 포탈 2의 스토리는 포탈 1과 이어지므로
꼭, 포탈 1을 클리어 한 후 포탈 2를 하길 권한다.

Velmi povedená hra s dobrým příbem, který je spojen s Half-life. Doporučuji si tuhle hru koupit a popřípadě zahrát si s kamarádem, možná vám tahle hra zruší přátelství.

Un juego que te envuelve en su historia y te hace sentir cada emocion cuando lo juegas, además te pone a pensar el como puedes resolver los puzzles, lo recomiendo 100% para aquellos que les gustan los juegos tipo puzzle

这个游戏实在是太优秀了，单机部分的剧情和动作与联机部分的合作都棒棒的，单人剧情最后的音乐《want you gone》实在太好听了。单人和联机大概需20小时左右全部通关,面对金色的麦田怅然若失。





                  "我们又见面了。"
　　"Well here we are again"
　　"这总令人感到愉快"
　　"It's always such a pleasure"
　　"还记得你有两次试图杀死我吗？"
　　"Remember when you tried to kill me twice?"
　　"喔，当时大家笑个不停"
　　"Oh how we laughed and laughed"
　　"只有我没有笑"
　　"Except I wasn't laughing"
　　"在此情形中"
　　"Under the circumstances"
　　"我的状态还真不错"
　　"I've been shockingly nice"
　　"你想要自由？拿去"
　　"You want your freedom? Take it"
　　"这正是我所期待的"
　　"That's what I'm counting on"
　　"我过去曾希望你死，但是"
　　"I used to want you dead but"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
　　"Now I only want you gone"
　　"她看上去还真像你"
　　"She was a lot like you"
　　"或许没有你这般重"
　　"Maybe not quite as heavy"
　　"现在小凯若琳也在这里"
　　"Now little Caroline is in here too"
　　"有天，他们将我唤醒"
　　"One day they woke me up"
　　"所以，我可以长生不老"
　　"So I could live forever"
　　"而你却永远也无法像我这样，这真让人遗憾"
　　"It's such a shame the same will never happen to you"
　　"你只剩下短暂而悲哀的人生"
　　"You've got your short sad life left"
　　"这正是我所期待的"
　　"That's what I'm counting on"
　　"你最好有话直说"
　　"I'll let you get right to it"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
　　"Now I only want you gone"
　　"再见，我唯一的朋友"
　　"Goodbye my only friend"
　　"哦，你以为我是指你吗？"
　　"Oh, did you think I meant you?"
　　"如果当时情况没那么糟，这会比较有趣"
　　"That would be funny if it weren't so sad"
　　"好了，现在你已被取代"
　　"Well you have been replaced"
　　"我现在不需要任何人"
　　"I don't need anyone now"
　　"如果我把你删除，"
　　"When I delete you maybe"
　　"那么或许我就不会再感到这么难过"
　　"I'll stop feeling so bad"
　　"去制造一些新的灾难吧"
　　"Go make some new disaster"
　　"这正是我所期待的"
　　"That's what I'm counting on"
　　"你是留给其他人的问题"
　　"You're someone else's problem"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
　　"Now I only want you gone"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
　　"Now I only want you gone"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
　　"Now I only want you gone"
　　"现在我只希望你离开"
